title: Kaze and the Wild Masks - Original Soundtrack Bundle
description: Go on a journey as Kaze in this 90’s classics inspired platformer. When the Crystal Islands get cursed, Kaze needs to save her friend Hogo. Find the Wild Masks to unleash the powers of the legendary guardians and master land, sky and sea. This bundle includes the OST.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Kaze and the Wild Masks-hi4sq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/834996d652f343dead5ac2465d8000d4/kaze-and-the-wild-masks-hi4sq.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About Kaze and the Wild Masks
<!--text-->
In Kaze and the Wild Masks, you journey through the Crystal Islands in 90’s classics platformer style. Play as Kaze and save your friend Hogo from a curse that spread chaos around the islands. Face enraged living vegetables by invoking the powers of the Wild Masks. Pounce ferociously like a tiger, soar through the sky like an eagle, sprint fiercely like a lizard and rule the sea like a shark.

<!--image-->
![Kaze and the Wild Masks-19qpy](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/834996d652f343dead5ac2465d8000d4/kaze-and-the-wild-masks-19qpy.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Features
<!--text-->
• Unleash the skills of the Wild Masks to get powers from the tiger, eagle, lizard and shark
• Uncover the secrets of the Crystal Islands in 30+ levels with over 50 bonus levels
• Relive your childhood memories of classic platformers with high quality frame by frame pixel art
• Pave your way through a satisfyingly smooth, but challenging platformer

<!--image-->
![Kaze and the Wild Masks-1w0nj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/834996d652f343dead5ac2465d8000d4/kaze-and-the-wild-masks-1w0nj.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About Kaze and the Wild Masks - Original Soundtrack
<!--text-->
Kaze and the Wild Masks has nostalgia and retro style written all over it, which means the music is no exception. With vibrant colors, lively characters and difficult platforming challenges, Kaze and the Wild Masks also offers energetic music and captivating melodies that compliments the spirit of the game. Listen to the 30 songs of the original soundtrack + 3 exclusive bonus tracks for a total of 75 minutes of music produced exclusively for the game.

The soundtrack was composed by Paulo Bohrer, audio designer and composer of the development studio PixelHive.
